backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact submissions with validation and per-caller rate limiting, providing functions to submit and retrieve contacts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, involved files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file and asset.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app and defining metadata for SEO and social previews.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all site sections and applying SEO metadata from config.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, quick links, and attribution with link-handling logic.
frontend/src/components/sections/Arduino: Renders an Arduino sketch with a copy-to-clipboard button and displays code using the provided temperature threshold.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMed: Displays demo media including an optional video and images with fallback handling for load errors.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Shows a grid of feature cards and a banner image based on a provided features list.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Builds a hero header with background image, project branding, and CTA buttons with scroll or link actions.
frontend/src/components/sections/ManualS: Presents a user manual containing required components, wiring instructions, and setup steps using the temperature threshold.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Shows the project overview text in a styled centered layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Practic: Displays a grid of application cards with icons and logic details plus a hysteresis note alert.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Renders a tech stack section showing each technology as a styled badge.
frontend/src/components/sections/Thresho: Provides an interactive temperature simulation that visualizes threshold behavior and fan activation.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll-based styling, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider with login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Fetches all contacts using the current actor and updates the cached actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Handles submitting a contact form with loading, success, and error state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/backendClient.ts: Provides helper functions for submitting and retrieving contact data using a cached backend actor.
frontend/src/lib/resolveAppUrl.ts: Resolves asset paths to full URLs based on the app's base URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for site configuration and exports the full config object containing project details, features, applications, media, and SEO settings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, generated assets, and a list of existing implemented features with versions.
